SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppFacade
AppFacade is a facade class responsible for initializing and coordinating the main components of the game.
AppHandler
Handles the entire game interactions process by coordinating different game's components.
AppState
Maintains the current state of the entire application by keeping saved all its data
AWSException
AWSException is a custom exception that is thrown when an error occurs related to AWS operations.
AWSHandler
The AWSHandler class is responsible for handling interactions with AWS S3, including saving, loading, and deleting game state data.
Backpack
The Backpack class represents the backpack of the pirate.
BackpackState
The BackpackState class is a concrete implementation of the InteractionState interface.
BackpackWeightExceededException
BackpackWeightExceededException is a custom exception that is thrown when the weight limit of the backpack is exceeded.
CollectableItem
CollectableItem is an implementation of the Entity interface.
CommandPanel
CommandPanel is a crucial component of the game's user interface, responsible for handling user commands and displaying system messages.
CommandPanelHandler
This class is responsible for handling the commands from the CommandPanel.
EndGameState
EndGameState is a concrete implementation of the InteractionState interface.
Entity
Entity is an interface that represents an entity in the game.
EntitySelectState
EntitySelectState handles user interactions when an entity is selected.
Event
An Event occurs when Observable class AppHandler triggers an update to its Observers
GameState
Represents the state of the game, including the pirate, the map, and the title of the game instance saved in the AWS.
GameStateTranslator
GameStateTranslator is a utility class responsible for translating GameStates to JSON format and vice versa.
GraphicsPanel
It is responsible for displaying the graphical elements of the game, including backgrounds, game states, and pirate images.
InitGameState
The InitGameState class represents the initial game state where the player starts or continues the game.
InteractionState
The InteractionState interface is part of the state design pattern used in the game.
ItemActionState
The ItemActionState class is a concrete implementation of the InteractionState interface.
ItemNotFoundException
ItemNotFoundException is a custom exception that is thrown when an item is not found in the list of items it's being searched in.
LoadGameState
The LoadGameState class implements the InteractionState interface.
Location
The Location class represents a location in the game world.
MainFrame
The MainFrame class is a JFrame that serves as the main window for the application.
Map
The Map class represents the game world.
MenuState
The MenuState class represents the main menu state in the game.
MoveState
The MoveState class is a concrete implementation of the InteractionState interface.
NPC
NPC is an implementation of the Entity interface.
Observable
The Observable interface defines methods for managing observers that are interested in changes to the observable object.
Observer
The Observer interface defines a method to be called when an observable object is updated.
Obstacle
The Obstacle class implements the Entity interface.
Pair<K,V>
A generic class representing a pair of values.
PairAdapter
PairAdapter is a custom Gson adapter used for serializing and deserializing Pair objects.
PairObstacleMapAdapter
PairObstacleMapAdapter is a custom TypeAdapter used for serializing and deserializing HashMaps with Pair<Integer, Integer> keys and Obstacle values.
Pirate
The Pirate class represents the player character in the game.
RunOutOfLivesException
RunOutOfLivesException is a custom exception that is thrown when a pirate runs out of lives in the game.
SaveEvent
Occurs when Observable class AppHandler wants to notify AWSHandler Observer in order to save the current game state
SurroundingsState
The SurroundingsState class represents the state where the player is looking around in their current location.
UIEvent
Occurs when Observable class AppHandler wants to notify CommandPanelHandler and GraphicsPanel Observers in order to update the GUI
UserQueryResult
Represents the result of a user query, including the result message and success status.
ViewableItem
ViewableItem is an implementation of the Entity interface.
WindowState
The WindowState enum represents the different states that the game window can be in.
